channel.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition data type contains general information relating to a single hard drive partition. Local diskNumber A hardware component partition's order in the [[SoftLayer_Hardware_Hardware|hardware]]. Type: integer grow A flag indicating if a partition is the grow partition. The grow partition will grow to fill all remaining space on a disk. There can only be one. Type: integer
